name: Settlers of the Peak
description:
Lead your humble community of villagers to the top of the mountain, where a wonderful view awaits them! But beware, the rival tribe aims just as high, and they desire to settle at the peak as well. Make it to the top of the mountain before the rival tribe makes it there first!

All art and programming made by me, Keltfire. Font is Thaleah PixelFont on the Unity asset store.

This game was originally made as a submission for the Zeno Jam 6 Game Jam, however I may expand upon it in the future! Keep an eye out for updates.
